mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ AS reservCancelSeq /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.ALL_CANCEL_YN AS allCancelYn /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_REQ_DT AS cancelReqDt /* 취소 요청 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_FEE_AMT AS cancelFeeAmt /* 취소 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.FEE_PAY_YN AS feePayYn /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_STATUS AS cancelStatus /* 취소 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_CANCEL /* 예약 취소 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.ALL_CANCEL_YN = #{allCancelYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.FEE_PAY_YN = #{feePayYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ = #{reservCancelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_RESERV_CANCEL_PK(P),SYS_C0011615(C) */ AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22), FK_EZC_RESERV_BASE_EZC_RESERV_(R),SYS_C0011616(C) */ AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22), FK_EZC_RESERV_ROOM_EZC_RESERV_(R) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_CANCEL /* 예약 취소 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.ALL_CANCEL_YN = #{allCancelYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.FEE_PAY_YN = #{feePayYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ = #{reservCancelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_REQ_DT = #{cancelReqDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 요청 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_FEE_AMT = #{cancelFeeAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 취소 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_STATUS = #{cancelStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ AS reservCancelSeq /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.ALL_CANCEL_YN AS allCancelYn /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_REQ_DT AS cancelReqDt /* 취소 요청 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_FEE_AMT AS cancelFeeAmt /* 취소 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.FEE_PAY_YN AS feePayYn /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_STATUS AS cancelStatus /* 취소 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_CANCEL /* 예약 취소 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.ALL_CANCEL_YN = #{allCancelYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.FEE_PAY_YN = #{feePayYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ = #{reservCancelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_REQ_DT = #{cancelReqDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 요청 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_FEE_AMT = #{cancelFeeAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 취소 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.CANCEL_STATUS = #{cancelStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_CANCEL.RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_CANCEL SET /* 예약 취소 정보 */ ALL_CANCEL_YN = #{allCancelYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 전체 취소 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,CANCEL_REQ_DT = #{cancelReqDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 요청 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,CANCEL_FEE_AMT = #{cancelFeeAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 취소 수수료 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,FEE_PAY_YN = #{feePayYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 수수료 결제 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,CANCEL_STATUS = #{cancelStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ = #{reservCancelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_CANCEL /* 예약 취소 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_CANCEL_SEQ = #{reservCancelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 취소 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
